roleset.name: to share the feelings or ideas

example.name: transitive
example.text: We sympathize with Mrs. Thatcher 's reluctance [*] to tie her currency to one governed [*]by the domestic political imperatives of West Germany .
example.arg: with Mrs. Thatcher 's reluctance [*] to tie her currency to one governed [*]by the domestic political imperatives of West Germany

example.name: adjectival rel: sympathetic
example.text: I was sympathetic to STV , but then it seems that in the recent Irish elections it 's just as vulnerable to disproportionalities as FPTP ...

roleset.note: SYMPATHIZE-V NOTES: 'sympathize' based on WSJ corpus, 'sympathetic' based on BOLT-1. Member of Vncls empathize-88.2. (from sympathize.01-v)
SYMPATHETIC-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from sympathetic.01-j)
